values: Some startlingly relevant pastoral lessons from Kenya | Pr Kip’ ChelashawSome startlingly relevant pastoral lessons from Kenya | Pr Kip' Chelashaw

Pastor Jeffery talks with Pastor Kip’ Chelashaw from Nairobi, Kenya, about some lessons about discipleship for young people, adults, husbands and wives, and more, all of which are startlingly relevant to the church in the modern West.
